page.title: 14THE LIFE OF A CHILD (CONTD)
page.content:
We have{breakfast}at about 9.00 a.m and I have cornflakes and toast. After that, I go and brush my teeth. Then my friends and I play{cricket}in our back garden. At about 11 o'clock, when everyone has had a go, we go round to Dougee's house to play on his {computer.}Then I go home and have lunch - we have{pizzas and chips.}
After lunch we go shopping for the rest of the afternoon. When I get back I watch a{feature film}and then have tea. At 7.00 p.m. I go out and play tennis again with my brother. At 9.00 p.m. I have a wash, then I read until {9.45 p.m.}when I go to bed.
